body:
Dear B2B Marketers, 
 
Create your own prospect lists fast and easy with our B2B email CDs. 
 
We provide reliable, opt-in ready email addresses for email marketing in 
every industry in convenient database applications available for immediate 
download. 
Customers from around the world have relied on our databases to reach 
prospects right from their inboxes for the past years. 
 
 
More details at: http://61.129.51.17
subject: [SPAM]  Perfect Marketing Solution
